actions.recommendation: Your Nerve IQ is suggesting you need rest.
Decreasing your amount of coffee to 2 cups a day and practicing mindfulness can assist.

Dietician recommended - BMI is raised, you have an increased waist circumference and your cholesterol levels are raised despite being on cholesterol treatment and being active. Increase Omega 3 intake by taking a supplement of 2-4g's daily
One of your liver markers the GGT is slightly raised. Please stop alcohol intake for at least 2-4 weeks and have it repeated.
Your eGFR (kidney function) is 82. This can be normal or a marker of early disease. A urine sample for protein:creatinine ratio is indicated as well as a repeat of your eGFR in 3 months time.
